name: @oaklean/windows-sensorinterface
author: Hitabis GmbH
description: A library that provides a binary that utilizes the LibreHardwareMonitor library to capture energy measurements on Windows

scripts.build: npm run clear-build && npx cross-env NODE_ENV=production npx tsc
scripts.postinstall: node -e "if ((process.env.NODE_ENV || '').toLocaleLowerCase() === 'development' && !require('fs').existsSync('dist/install.js')) { require('child_process').execSync('npm run build', { stdio: 'inherit' }); }" && node dist/install.js
